examples: The doctor, however, refused to provide pills to assist with suicide.

meanings.definition: To make less in amount or size.
examples: Those who are against assisted suicide also worry that family members might urge a sick relative to die in order to reduce medical bills.

meanings.definition: To make less in amount or size.
examples: Those who are against assisted suicide also worry that family members might urge a sick relative to die in order to reduce medical bills.
In all other states a doctor who assists a suicide is considered to be guilty of murder.

images.alt: Photo of a person looking down, hand on chin, as if thinking.
images.description: A person looking down. He has his hand on his chin. He looks like he is thinking about something.
images.caption: It is important to carefully consider important decisions.

examples: In all other states a doctor who assists a suicide is deemed to be guilty of murder.

images.alt: Photo of a person looking down, hand on chin, as if thinking.
images.description: A person looking down. He has his hand on his chin. He looks like he is thinking about something.
images.caption: Someone thinking carefully about an important decision.

examples: When Ryan’s uncle was in the hospital in severe pain the doctor said he had only about a month to live.

images.alt: Photo of a holding her stomach with a pained expression on her face.
images.description: A person lays on her side. She holds her stomach. Her eyes are closed, her mouth is open in a grimace, as though she is in pain.
images.caption: This person looks like she is in a lot of pain.

source.title: Black woman in pain on couch
source.author: Sora Shimazaki

examples: When Ryan’s uncle was in the hospital in terrible pain the doctor said he had only about a month to live.

images.alt: Photo of a holding her stomach with a pained expression on her face.
images.description: A person lays on her side. She holds her stomach. Her eyes are closed, her mouth is open in a grimace, as though she is in pain.
images.caption: This person looks like she is in a lot of pain.

source.title: Black woman in pain on couch
source.author: Sora Shimazaki

examples: When Ryan’s uncle was in the hospital in excruciating pain the doctor said he had only about a month to live.

images.alt: Photo of a holding her stomach with a pained expression on her face.
images.description: A person lays on her side. She holds her stomach. Her eyes are closed, her mouth is open in a grimace, as though she is in pain.
images.caption: This person looks like she is in a lot of pain.

source.title: Black woman in pain on couch
source.author: Sora Shimazaki

meanings.definition: To strongly encourage or try to persuade.
examples: Those who are against assisted suicide also worry that family members might urge a sick relative to die in order to reduce medical bills.
Those who are against assisted suicide also worry that family members might ask a sick relative to die in order to reduce medical bills.

meanings.definition: To beg urgently of (someone) or for (something).
examples: Those who are against assisted suicide also worry that family members might implore a sick relative to die in order to reduce medical bills.

meanings.definition: The act or process of stopping something from happening.
examples: Diet can play an important role in the prevention of disease.

images.alt: Photo of a group of people talking while wearing medical masks.
images.description: A group of people talking while wearing medical face masks.
images.caption: Prevention, like wearing masks, is a good way to stop the spread of illnesses.

source.title: Business People Wearing Face Masks and Talking
source.author: August de Richelieu

examples: The students are critical of the bad tasting cafeteria food.

images.alt: Photo of a person frowning, pointing at the viewer.group of people talking while wearing medical masks.
images.description: A person is frowning, and her brow are furrowed. She looks unhappy and points her finger at the viewer.
images.caption: This person looks like she is not happy with someone.

source.title: Ethnic woman frowning face and pointing at camera
source.author: Alex Green

meanings.definition: To spend time doing; work at; practice.
To make different in some way; change.
examples: The dress was altered to make it shorter.

meanings.definition: A way of dealing with something.
examples: Her approach to studying for tests seems to work.
